Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique item holds significant value to us and we believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its quality and uniqueness, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12000. We understand that the true value of this product may vary depending on your needs, but we are confident that this offer presents a great opportunity for you. Should you have any questions or need more information, please let us know. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
